title: Reconnect issue
body: I've finished a game and skipped waiting for stats and then I couldn't create another normal game and then I restarted the game and now it keep showing the reconnect button.[](http://imgur.com/YNyl9bN)

replies.body: This looks like a ghost game, meaning the match's end hasn't been communicated to the server yet.  A relog or waiting about an hour should fix this up.  Everything should be okay now!
